website_summaries.verdict: A great stroller for kids up to 42-inches tall and between 6 and 50 pounds.
pros: Includes a convenient parent tray that features two cup holders and a covered storage compartment
Boasts locking front swivel wheels with a foot-activated rear brake system and quick and easy compact fold
Multi-position seat recline with five-point safety harness ensures kids can sit comfortably and securely
An ideal stroller to take twins or close siblings along on daily activities
cons: Sometimes wobbles, even at a slow speed
Tends to be bigger and heavier than comparable Baby Trend strollers

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Spend more to get a better product.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in not only the stroller but the customer service as well. The front wheel on this is terrible. Not only has it seized several times and needed to be fixed but it is wobbly, loud, and I believe unsafe. I called customer service and they simply told me that they won’t support the product because their warranty is only 6 months. Baby Trend could’ve cared less about my children’s safety while in the stroller. Complete waste of almost $200- should’ve bit the bullet and bought a stroller that is more expensive. At least then maybe my kids would be less likely to be hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it but kinda heavy
customer_reviews.text: Stroller is kind of bulky yet so convenient and easy to push. I love it, just wish it folded a bit smaller. It takes up my entire trunk space.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Branch

customer_reviews.title: The best thing about this double stroller/jogger is the fact that ...
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this double stroller/jogger is the fact that the rear wheels come off with one click. We have a prius and no double stollers/joggers would fit or if they did it would take up the whole trunk... Not with this one. Take both back wheels off and it takes maybe 10% of my trunk space. It lays flat and i put the wheels on it. So we can load grocerys or anything else on it and still know we have room. Highly recommended if you have a small car trunk space.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Church

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe for jogging.
customer_reviews.text: Do not jog on anything but level, even, paved, blemish free surfaces. Walking, this thing is a dream. However, jogging on my packed dirt driveway locked the front wheel, sending my 1 and 3 year old face first into the ground and launching me over the top. No major injuries sustained, just bumped knees and foreheads, and a shattered phone that flew out of the holder. Dont jog. Dont use outdoors, a single rock can send you all flying.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi Stracener

customer_reviews.title: We love this stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I studied many different strollers before picking this one for my 3 year old and 10 month old. I am so glad I picked this stroller! It is great for trails, was manageable through soft sand, and perfect for jogging. Obviously it's wide as its side by side, but I have still been able to get it through many doorways at stores and even the zoo.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Easy, lightweight, awesome double stroller.
customer_reviews.text: I love the maneuver ability of this stroller. It's my every day stroller. I live on brick paved roads and grassy terrain so this stroller works perfectly. Its great for jogging and fits most doors as long as you open them all the way. Your kids will be able to lean on each other. Has a big storage compartment on the bottom. I'm a single mom with twins and this has been a life saver. It folds in half so it does take up a lot of space in my CRV. You do have to add air to the tires. I've filled it with a bike pump or at the gas station. Works great.i
customer_reviews.author: Twinamama

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this jogger!! We use it for everything. It rides smoothly and my boys aren't tossed around. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because there is not much support in the middle so they do tend to side together.
customer_reviews.author: dp09

customer_reviews.title: High quality product!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this stroller is so great, especially for price!! Bought for my mom when she takes care of our 1yo and our nieces who is 8mo. The speaker on it is pretty bad quality and pretty much useless unfortunately. I was excited for that feature because my mom loved playing music on walks. It was easy to assemble. Requires two hands to fold and is a little heavy which can be problematic when taking care of two little ones. But honestly still really worth it for what great qualify it is. Mobility is super smooth and easy, even on uneven surfaces. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kevin lankford

customer_reviews.title: Don’t spend $800 on a stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love this jogger!! It pushes so smooth, folds up great and can easily be stored and set aside. I have an almost 1 1/2 yr old and almost 3 yr old. My oldest is big for her age (40+lbs and very tall) and she fits pretty well. I don’t think we’ll be able to use it next summer, but for the price, it’s worth it! The only thing I don’t like is how the seats adjust to flat and sitting up. It’s adjusted with buckle straps. I don’t think they sit up far enough, but it’s a minor detail! I def recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Juli P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great outdoor stroller, especially for the price. It's super easy to push around and fits my 2 year old and my one month old comfortably. It is pretty heavy to fold down and lift into the trunk of the car by myself but we mainly use it at home, going for walks or the occasional day trip. You will need a bicycle pump for the tires. Wish I knew that before hand as it would have saved a trip to the store but overall I do really like it and my kids seem to enjoy riding around.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: This thing is AMAZEBALLS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never had one of these, so maybe they all are great - but for the cost (as compared to others) this one is awesome. It fit through my front door, is easy to maneuver and fit both my 4 year old and 6.5 month old. It is a tight fit for my older child - but not such that she was uncomfortable. I think she'll be happy in there for a while. I couldn't be more thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: AZThinker

customer_reviews.title: Great versatility, would be 5 star if tray was available
customer_reviews.text: The stroller rolls and maneuvers extremely well, my wife especially like how easy it pushed. It's also relatively narrow which helps getting through doorways. I would rate it five stars if the stroller had a tray available then went across the front. It would be helpful when you used it for places like Target or the mall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay in shape together as a family!
customer_reviews.text: Had a front back and was unhappy so we went with a side by side. Game changer! We jog so this one was perfect! Just make sure yo-yo coo the front wheel when you go jogging or the wobble will get you the first time it ever happens. Plenty of storage. Dual adjusting seats. Only downfall is the sun shade is slightly small but have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: JM7

customer_reviews.title: DISNEY TESTED
customer_reviews.text: You guys, its' hard to impress me. This stroller was AMAZING. It's super light, easy to push, feels like you're floating. Easy to fold and easy to carry. There is nothing I would change, I would have paid 300-400 now that I've used it. It handled a week of disney and airports like a champ. Super impressed. Buy this one. Stop shopping and hit "Order"
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: I love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller, smooth ride, easy assembly, my only complaint with it, is that I keep getting flat tires! Otherwise it's great for my twins. Also the speaker function is terrible, you're better off just using your phones speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Kandice Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Only came with 1 screw, no nuts nor washers either!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a single BT Expedition and LOVE IT, best stroller ever. So when our wagon for the girls broke, my husband decided to get the BT Expedition Double. BUT, as my review headline says the box only came with 1 screw and no washers either!!! Haven't tested the speakers yet, I'm going to be shocked if those actually work. I am so livid right now. This is such a disappointment. Lot of money for a product that was clearly missing over half the parts AND GET THIS to return it I have to fork out the shipping cost.....pure BS, I wont make any more sizable purchases via Amazon....
customer_reviews.author: Jamie C.

customer_reviews.title: Who needs BOB?
customer_reviews.text: It's funny because everyone is talking about the front swivel wheel shaking while jogging but you are supposed to not have the wheel is swivel mode while jogging so that fixes that problem. I have also heard it doesn't fit through door ways but so far I haven't had a door way it didn't fit through. It stays balanced even with just one kid and theres plenty of room for storage. And the major bonus... it fits in the trunk of my 2001 civic! Not even my single jogging stroller fit in there! Why spend a small fortune on a BOB when you can buy this one? Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jo H.

customer_reviews.title: Makes pushing two kids effortless!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! The wheels make pushing over any terrain so easy and effortless and it turns on a dime. It is very well made and very comfortable, my kiddos love it! I also love the adjustable canopy that makes it easy to keep the sun out of their faces. I would definitely recommend, you will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than i expected
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller! Haven't noticed any shaking while jogging. I use it for my 3 year old and my 3 month old and works perfectly. Even fits through my doorways! And fits in the trunk of my Honda civic.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McCurdy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product, Amazing Price
customer_reviews.text: My husband didn't want me to get a double stroller, that we would just use two strollers or have our oldest walk. We've had for a year now and he said it's my best motherhood purchase!! Our very tall 3 year old (size of a 5 year old) fits with her long legs. Great prosuct for the price. We've never had to air up the wheels!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We purchased when they were 4 months old and they love it. The seats recline for their comfort and ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a no brainer on savings and value. I use the jogger every single day with my twins. We purchased when they were 4 months old and they love it. The seats recline for their comfort and support. It's light weight, smooth and you can't beat the price. Plus it is SUPER easy to set up when it first arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love Baby Trend. This stroller is prefect. No complaints on how "comfortable" the straps are at all. Speakers are a nice perk but are a bit too quiet. I recommend taking the tires into a bike shop and getting thorn proof tubes if you plan to use it for nature walks or grassy terrain. Mine got a flat in the first week. But getting better tubes worked well.
customer_reviews.author: RugbYogi

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller, works really well for both our kiddos
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller, works really well for both our kiddos. My only complaint is that when it arrived the rubber gripping on the handle bars weren't in the correct position, both were all the way to the left, which also meant we couldn't put one of the add-on accessories on. My husband had to get WD-40 to move the grips to the center of the handle bar where they are supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea LaClair

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking at a double jogging stroller i have a single bob but could not pay $600-700 for a double, I'm so glad I found this one, it works great, love it
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re reading reviews right now trying to figure out if this stroller will be nice even though it’s ! so affordable, yes! It’s not the top of the line. But for this price it is so nice! My kids love it! Plenty of room for the kids and plenty of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Its pretty lightweight, almost too much as my toddler climbed ...
customer_reviews.text: I can see why users say the kids lean into the middle. That is a major flaw in design. I rigged it but rolling up a towel and placing it on one of the sides. Its pretty lightweight, almost too much as my toddler climbed up and it almost flipped over. I would suggest it to people, but just know about the middle part.
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic stroller for price!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller met all my expectations, It moves great and was easy to put together. Its bulky when storing in the car (Nissan Rogue) but that is to be expected with a double stroller. It fits through most doors as well, though going shopping in most clothing stores or in a public restroom is hard to do. The quality is fantastic and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Double trouble in California
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I don't jog but it's great for walks. My four year old can push this with my 2 yr old twins cuss tires are smooth. Speakers are ok . Lots of storage, I fit this in tahoe behind 3rd row seat with tires off "pop off easy" just a button, fits through my door way folds down to store super easy. Held up to my 9 year old sitting in it for what its worth, not the most aesthetic looking stroller but can't beat quality
customer_reviews.author: Noah Yates

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller AND great price
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller for the price. The drink holder fits the kids bottles perfectly and the cubby is big enough for my huge phone. Umbrella can more freely for better sun protection. Baskets underneath make great room for storage and my 2.5 year old loves sitting next to her baby brother. Overall great stroller for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Rolls smooth, easy to push, turns in place, stable and great for two kids. If you’re looking for the best double stroller, this is the one you need. We use it every week at Disney!
customer_reviews.author: Clay K.

customer_reviews.title: I love the tray it’s holds 2 drinks plus my phone
customer_reviews.text: Seats are a little close together but I can fit through door. I love the tray it’s holds 2 drinks plus my phone, keys, taker and pepper spray. My older daughter stuffs her backpack underneath in the baskets and there are even extra storage behind the seats. Great for running or pretend running (what I do)
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Same as a lot of other users the front wheel ...
customer_reviews.text: Same as a lot of other users the front wheel is poorly constructed and wobbles at any speed above a snail pace
customer_reviews.author: Tyler H.

customer_reviews.title: And I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted this stroller for almost 3 years and we finally purchased it. And I love it!! We live in the country on a dirt road so taking my littles for walks wasn’t always enjoyable for me. I love how easy to use this is and the way it just glides on the road! And it feels and seems to be of great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! It is narrow enough to fit through most doors, and it is so light. Plus, the seats sit up pretty straight- I've tried other strollers and hate that they seem to have a permanent recline to them- this one has a buckle to keep the kiddos upright. I have three different strollers, but this is my first choice always- unless I'm going somewhere that I know I'm going to need my narrower Sit n Stand.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great for jogging and walking. Daughter falls asleep everytime because the ride is so smooth. It basically pushes itself, it's so light. Only downside is portability. It takes up a lot of space even when collapsed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Schrader

customer_reviews.title: Great quality stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great quality stroller: has a great light ride: is pretty comparable to the "bob" without paying the additional... save your self the money and purchase this stroller, it has the front tire swivel so its easy to maneuver!
customer_reviews.author: cindy Ward

customer_reviews.title: I like the stroller
customer_reviews.text: I like the stroller, it is very nice to use when we go on walks. It pushes easy anywhere we go but the double seats are not separated so the kids lean into each other, and there are no cup holders or storage area for my kids to put sunglasses or snacks.
customer_reviews.author: debra jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Shopped around alot and this really was the best value for what I needed. Perfect for long walks and great on rough terrain. Got an open box deal for $100 and am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasant for much less $$!
customer_reviews.text: Like anything, with a little care and caution (e.g. no demolition derby, no boulder traversing, etc.) this stroller will outlast our need for it! We have a couple varieties of this stroller now. They aren't super strong or fancy, but super light, fold really small, and easy enough to maneuver--and our kids really enjoy them!
customer_reviews.author: B.G.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t air up the tires.
customer_reviews.text: This stroller did well for us initially. However after airing up low tires, it hasn’t been easy to use. The front tire now wobbles violently at any kind of speed. So bad that it will suddenly turn to the side and force you to a dead stop. We have tried deflating the tires again and hebe yet to find the happy working level.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Jogging Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Works great a jogging stroller. Awesome build quality for the price. It’s easy to fold but the cumbersome part is unfolding.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Pantaleon Coloma

customer_reviews.title: Great double stroller
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! The assembly takes about 30 minutes and is very easy with the instructions. Easy to control one handed when running. Fold up and out is smooth and takes little effort. Great stroller for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dnklilly

customer_reviews.title: Not light weight
customer_reviews.text: It is super easy to fold easy to move hard to move folded cause its heavy hard to lock wheels
customer_reviews.author: melody stottlemyer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it is just the bad one of the bunch.
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the middle on this review. Love the size of the stroller. Super roomy. But 1 wheel keeps going flat. And it is squeaky. The handle seems to hang down some. So to avoid squeaking I have to lightly hold or even lift handle. So its annoying. But when wheel is aired rides smooth. So thinking I got a lemon out of the bunch. Which sucks seeing what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: brittanymarie

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stroller! Bought for Disney World and this stroller got the job done. Durable, easy to push and my girls loved it. Only complaint...BIG STROLLER! It fits well in large suvs. Smaller suvs and cars you will have to take off the front wheel in order for it to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Stroller for the active parent
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had this one sooner. My kids like it. Its super durable and it moves flawlessly. Because it’s a two seater it does make it wide to get through some spaces but otherwise it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: ROLLS EASY ON ROUGH ROADS
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for bad Central American roads. Does very wee a.c 2nd was excepted by the airline free for travel at the gate.
customer_reviews.author: Pitt Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jogger!! LOVE that the front wheel turns! It’s comfortable and safe for my 3year old and 7 mo old. Fold down easy and locks together so it stays, my husband is always the one that lifts it so I can’t really say much about lightweight, but I’m sure I could manage it. Wouldn’t need the speakers, but they are a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra J Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Moves great for running.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. LOVE IT... moves easy and is so easy to push on my runs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and not too wide
customer_reviews.text: Very well thought out. Impressive everything for the price. My two under two enjoy our walks and I put our chihuahua underneath in the basket
customer_reviews.author: Amber B

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this in June. One tire won’t stay full and I can’t use it to jog as one wheel wobbles and feels unsteady. Spend the extra money and get a BOB if you intend to run.
customer_reviews.author: heather1006

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the job
customer_reviews.text: The only thing disappointing in this striker is there is no tray for my Littles. Small over look when purchasing this. Other than that it’s been an amazing purchase! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! The shade slides down over the kids faces to block the sun and give you access to them without having to stop or get in front of the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia A. McClain

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller for twins.
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller for hiking and outdoor adventures! It even replaced our regular in-line stroller because we prefer it's maneuverability. It it's wide enough to be a struggle to get through doors, though, so that needs to be considered if this is your primary stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Wobble Wobble Wobble
customer_reviews.text: Just received this jogger today. It arrived a day late and the stability is more than a dollar short. Anything over a walking pace and the front wheel shakes the entire stroller! Come to find out that it is a common issue with this brand according to YouTube complaints and so I'm not sure where all these rave reviews are coming from but I am not happy. With the price point of this stroller I shouldn't have to fix it to make it work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Kay23

customer_reviews.title: This is great for my two little girls (2&3)
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my two little girls (2&3). I was worried about the quality, BUT it is great. We use it for outings to the zoo, walks, jogs, etc. Favorite feature is that the sun shield is movable so you can adjust to where the sun is! Would recommend for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for my 2 year old and 4
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my 2 year old and 4.5 year old as well as my infant! Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: KRW

customer_reviews.title: Love my twin jogger stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Easiest stroller to push through any terrain. I have owned lots of strollers in 36 years of doing child care but none have been as nice as this one. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Barbianne Hantz

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for sure! loved this stroller! it’s super light and glides smoothly! ran a lot of miles with my two toddlers in this stroller!! will fit through most doors and if not the wheels pop off super easy making it a non issue!
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Front Wheel vibrate and stroller looks. UnSafe
customer_reviews.text: Front wheel started to woble, the entire stroller shakes and all wheels look when walking a mid speed. Absolutely disappointed and unsafe, please be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro J. Cabrales

customer_reviews.title: This has been a pretty good stroller for my 2 and 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: This has been a pretty good stroller for my 2 and 4 year old. It doesn't really "jog" well, since the front wheel wobbles furiously whenever we walk a quite fast pace, but it's good for fitting through regular doorways and being on the go. We've taken multiple trips to Disney World since we are pass holders and its held up!
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it rolls very smoothly. I had a broken part when it arrived, I called customer service and just waiting for the new wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D  Bartshe

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing ride
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that the cup holder snaps out of place when it is folded. Other than that, its a relaxing ride for the kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: OTIS LEE BURNEY, JR

customer_reviews.title: actually enjoy sitting in this
customer_reviews.text: Yes my kids do lean into each other as others have complained. My two, however, actually enjoy sitting in this, and my wife and I enjoy how it feels pushing it. After adjust and sliding the seats around a bit, my children aren't leaning into each other much anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: So excited to have this. We have gone on plenty of walks. Even on the beach once. Easy to push, a little heavy and hard to fold for me but easy for my hubby.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Waited all day for this bc I was so excited to use it with my kids. One of the back wheels is bent so badly it’s almost comical that they sent it out at all, and the snap ring was off the axel. Extremely disappointing - I wanted so badly to use this today with my kids. For the money spent, you’d expect a functioning product.
customer_reviews.author: Matt D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stroller. Period.
customer_reviews.text: Omg the best stroller ever. And the price is just amazing.
customer_reviews.author: C gheblikian

customer_reviews.title: Good jogger for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good jogger for the money. Only thing I don't like about it is the reclining mechanism. It's just a nylon strap/buckle that is cinched to adjust the recline angle. Small children who can't maintain posture yet may slump to one side due to cheap reclining mechanism. Not a deal breaker though.
customer_reviews.author: Eric and Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I run about 3 miles normally. My 2 1/2 and 1 y/o love riding in it. Enough space for them not to fight but still hold drinks and snack. Easy to turn even with front wheel locked. Steers well and no problems with front wheel wobble like my last stroller. Sun shade goes down and up easily for my older daughter to adjust as needed. They speaker is not very loud. My phones speaker mode is just as loud as the build in speakers. I still use speakers though so I can close the compartment and not have phone fall out. Overall super happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Hooton

customer_reviews.title: Tires are horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: The stroller seems nice other than the tires. I just bought this jogger on the 19th of May. Today i put it together which only took 10mins then i aired up the tires and the front tube wasnt secure. Pushed it out of the garage and the front tires tube started coming out! Now i have to send the WHOLE thing back or pay for a new tire! Its the beginning of summer and we like to go for family walks i am so disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: This is easy to manage and maneuver on a trail or walking ...
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to manage and maneuver on a trail or walking in the mall. It is easier and lighter weight than the single version we purchased years ago.
customer_reviews.author: J. WENDT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Get it. It's perfect for jogging or just using like a regular stroller.
customer_reviews.author: David Skidmore

customer_reviews.title: Good Stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love my double jogger stroller. I have twins, that i take for walks/jogs and this stroller is just perfect. Its light for its size, and easy to open and close. It has and aux with speaker build in, so i love to play my music while i walk. The babies enjoy it too.
customer_reviews.author: grapeape

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my third stroller. We have a bugaboo cameleon and a mclaren umbrella, both singles. Then we had baby #3 and baby #2 is still 2.. I knew I wanted a double but that it wouldn’t be used for long. This stroller is my favorite of our three. It is easy to move, smooth, kids are comfy, lots of space. This model does not have a speaker and the front wheel is lockable or swivel. What a super buy
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F.

customer_reviews.title: Really great! Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Really great! Light weight, easy to maneuver but durable. Only drawback is that it doesn't fit a car seat. But got a padded insert by Boppy that works great for extra support. Kids like it too!
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this over the Baby Jogger
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this over the Baby Jogger. Yes, the quality of Baby Jogger Summit and others are a little better but definitely not worth the price difference. Easy to fold, great on all terrain and perfect for condo/apt living.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Hold 3 year old and 11 month old easily. Good storage. Instructions say there is Bluetooth but there's not. I didn't care.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Overall great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Smooth riding. Just some areas of cheap material
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well while it lasts. Build quality is poor.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for the first 7 months, but pretty much as soon as the warranty expired, the rear wheels started coming loose from the axle. Now the stroller shakes violently when we try to push it. I'm hoping I can do a poor man's fix on it, as there are apparently no replacement parts. Disappointed in the quality of the materials and the short warranty.
customer_reviews.author: stickman

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller ever
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this stroller. Durable, easy to maneuver, and fits nicely in our vehicle, especially since the back wheels can come on and off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stroller; easy to fold, go around theme parks and fits in our Kia Soul! One of my favorite baby products
customer_reviews.author: Adam Kolb

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I worried about having issues with the front wheel as many reviews indicated this was a problem. I have yet to have any issues with that. Though I've only been walking (not jogging) with it so far. The speakers are a great feature. They function well, and I use the cord with my iPhone. The iPhone 5 fits nicely into the tray that houses the speakers (not too big). The parent tray is pretty nice and you can snap it on or off. There is ample storage for baby things (2 areas) to put baby stuff. Assembly was easy, it folds to be pretty compact (will fit in back of PT Cruiser).
customer_reviews.author: John M Kerwin

customer_reviews.title: Great all terrian stroller.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller for our twins. Exactingly what we needed for use outdoors at the tree farm.
customer_reviews.author: Terry B.

customer_reviews.title: I would have purchased something better but this was within my budget
customer_reviews.text: Many design flaws. I would have purchased something better but this was within my budget. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Magaly Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the mkney.
customer_reviews.text: If you run multiple times a week dont waste your money, didnt last a year.
customer_reviews.author: Trista Simone

customer_reviews.title: Light and fits
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Exactly what I wanted, especially for the price. It does drop a little in the middle (sling seat) making the kids lean together some, not a big deal until they are fighting. Also the frame is a little more flimsy than I expected. It fits in my car (Mazda 3) and it drives well, which is what I was after.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: So happy I decided to make this investment. I am not a pro runner, more of a neighborhood jogger bear in mind. This stroller does well on all types of surfaces. It maneuvers well, sturdy,stores easily, and is comfortable and smooth enough my 15 month old passes out every outing. I am just shy of 5 ft and I find the height perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love that it fits in to my small vehicle!
customer_reviews.author: amanda cavanagh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that I have to take the wheels off when I put it in the back of my explorer, but I still love the stroller. Use it daily
customer_reviews.author: Nallbee

customer_reviews.title: Not even used 3 times and the front wheel has ...
customer_reviews.text: Not even used 3 times and the front wheel has locked up. Baby trend refuses to help with any fixes or refunds! Spend your money elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Smooth and it does fit through my front door when unfolded. Kids are comfy and it’s helped me lose weight.
customer_reviews.author: Mjc2356

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this stroller
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this stroller. Bought it specifically for Disneyland and it has been amazing!! Comfortable seats, lots of storage, and easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: OurFamilyBand

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good, easy to use double stroller. Does not fit well in a trunk.
customer_reviews.author: BMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great!! its been 7 months and it is holding up just fine!
customer_reviews.author: HappyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 18mo old twin boys and it’s been great! Fits in the trunk of our Sonata and fits through the doors at the doctors office. Easy to fold/unfold.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Matta

customer_reviews.title: Best Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Most inexpensive jogging stroller. Just make sure to lock the wheel if you jog, or it will start shaking! Best money I've spent in a long time! Feels great to be active again.
customer_reviews.author: Allison lord

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my double stroller it's a great buy for the money and works wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: It is very big & takes up a lot of room in a car
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 year old and 2 year old and this is perfect!! I use to to walk/jog down a dirt road.
customer_reviews.author: Erika spain

customer_reviews.title: I can go anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I just love this. Able to take two kids and doggie with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Salina Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Great quality super affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Love this jogger! Exactly what I wished for. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Baby Trend Expedition Double Jogger, Centennial
product_meta.description: Color:Centennial| Style:Baby Trend Expedition Double Jogger,The Baby Trend expedition double jogging stroller makes your job as a parent easier. The dual-seat stroller comfortably fits two children, each up to 50 pounds. It's the ideal way to take twins or close siblings along on daily activities. This lightweight jogging stroller will satisfy any parent's desires with convenient features, while the children enjoy comfort and safety. This Baby Trend expedition double jogging stroller uses durable all-terrain pneumatic rubber bicycle tires, so whether you're running errands around town or running along a trail, this stroller can roll right along with you. This stroller uses a foot-activated rear brake for quick and easy stopping when you need your hands free. 31.5" width x 46" length x 42" height, 32 pounds.
feature_bullets: Designed for children from 6-50 pounds (each child) and no more than 42" tall
Multi-position seat recline with 5-point safety harness. Ratcheting shade canopy. Convenient parent tray includes two cup holders and covered storage compartment
16" rear and 12" front all-terrain, rubber pneumatic bicycle tires
Locking front swivel wheels with foot-activated rear brake system and quick and easy compact fold
Lightweight, sturdy construction. Quick release tires for storage and travel
